hymns.sanskrit:
अग्निमीळे पुरोहितं यज्ञस्य देवमृत्विजम् ।
होतारं रत्नधातमम् ॥
hymns.transliteration:
agnim īḷe purohitaṃ yajñasya devam ṛtvijam |
hotāraṃ ratnadhātamam ||
hymns.translation:
I praise Agni, the chosen Priest, God, minister of sacrifice,
the hotar, lavishest of wealth.

hymns.sanskrit:
अग्निः पूर्वेभिरृषिभिरीड्यो नूतनैरुत ।
स देवानेह वक्षति ॥
hymns.transliteration:
agniḥ pūrvebhir ṛṣibhir īḍyo nūtanair uta |
sa devāneh vakṣati ||
hymns.translation:
Agni is worthy to be praised by living as by ancient seers.
He shall bring hitherward the Gods.

hymns.sanskrit:
अग्निना रयिमश्नवत् पोषमेव दिवेदिवे ।
यशसं वीरवत्तमम् ॥
hymns.transliteration:
agninā rayim aśnavat poṣameva dive-dive |
yaśasaṃ vīravattamam ||
hymns.translation:
Through Agni man obtaineth wealth, prosperity day by day,
splendid and abounding in heroic sons.

hymns.sanskrit:
अग्ने यं यज्ञमध्वरं विश्वतः परिभूरसि ।
स इद्देवेषु गच्छति ॥
hymns.transliteration:
agne yaṃ yajñam adhvaraṃ viśvataḥ paribhūr asi |
sa id deveṣu gacchati ||
hymns.translation:
Agni, the perfect sacrifice which thou encompassest about
verily goeth to the Gods.

hymns.sanskrit:
अग्निर्होता कविक्रतुः सत्यश्चित्रश्रवस्तमः ।
देवो देवेभिरा गमत् ॥
hymns.transliteration:
agnir hotā kavikratuḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ |
devo devebhir ā gamat ||
hymns.translation:
May Agni, sapient-minded Priest, truthful, most gloriously great,
come with the Gods and sit on grass.
